runs.comm: lovely line to start off. Landed on a length, on the off and middle line, straightened a touch, Vincent was careful not to press his front foot across and dabbed it to the off side

Even better. This one bends back in after landing on a length on the middle and off stump line, Vincent leant forward and was cramped up a touch as the ball curved in but he adjusts to push it to the off side
huge shout for lbw. McCullum takes a step or two and tries to whip a length delivery on the off and middle line across the line and is rapped on the pads. It would have crashed into the off stump.

almost caught by the point fielder running back. Offcutter this time, on the middle and off, McCullum again tries to whip across the line - can we play straight please? - and gets a leading edge over point. Dilshan ran back and stretched his hand out, gets a finger to it but cant' hold on
on the off and middle line, pushed to the off side for a quick single. Fernando lets rip a overthrow
on the off stump line, leans forward to steer it to point
short in length, on the stumps, pulled over midwicket

Dropped by Jayasuriya at short fine leg. Banged in short, on the left shoulder, McCullum short-arm pulls it to Jayasuriya who got two hands to the ball climbing over him to his right but can't hold on to it.
beaten. Fuller in length, in the zone outside off stump, McCullum tries to drive on the up but misses the line completely
driven through the off side for a single
Vincent takes a step forward, Vass hurls a offcutter on the off and middle, McCullum is squared-up, gets a leading edge to third man
Gave himself room by moving to the leg side and slammed a length delivery over extra cover. Predetermined but effective.
full in length, driven to mid-off
on the off stump line, on a length ,pushed to cover
slower one, off cutter on the off stump line, pushed to cover
full in length, on the middle and leg, ugly swipe across the line attempted and the inside-edge gets the ball to fine leg
slower one, bouncing over the stumps as Vincent misses a pull shot
short in length, nipping in off the seam, defended back to the bowler
Full in length, on the off stump line, McCullum checks his drive and gets a leading edge over cover point
Short and rising, McCullum pulls it straight to long leg. McCullum was dropped twice and Sri Lank have been third time lucky
on the off stump, on a length, chopped to third man
full in length, on the middle stump line, straightens, nudged to the on side
offbreak this time, on the middle stump line, nudged back to the bowler
off cutter, on the middle and off stump line, driven to the right of mid-off
length delivery on the off stump line, punched to cover
fuller, almost yorker length, on the off and middle, squeezed out to point. New Zealand are struggling here.
Low full toss - waist-high - on the off and middle, Vincent goes for a slash down the ground, ends up scooping it between mid-off and mid-on and both nearly collide but  Chamara Silva takes the catch
way down the leg side, wide called
short in length, on the off and middle, Fulton plays a lovely pull shot over deep midwicket. That kept travelling.
slower one on the off and middle stump line, checks his drive and the ball goes in the air towards mid-on
short in length, on the middle and leg stump line, shapes to pull, inside-edge to the pad
straying on the pads, Fulton shuffles across and drills it through midwicket
full in length, slanting away from the off stump, pushed to  cover point for a single
on the leg and middle, off a length, worked past square leg
on a length, on the middle and leg, nudged to the on side
fullish, outside the off stump, tries to whip it across the line, gets a outside edge to third man
yorker length, on the leg and middle line, turned past square leg
poor ball, Vaas strays down leg side and Fulton stands tall and flicks it off his pads over the long leg boundary, he's using his leverage superbly
bowled flat on middle stump, pushed through midwicket for a single
flighted delivery on middle stump, Fulton lunges forward and tries to slog sweep, the ball grips the pitch and turns a long way across Fulton
swept to long leg for one more
Fulton moves on to the back foot and tries to pull and gets hit on the pad, that would have hit the stumps but the ball pitched outside leg stump
played to short fine leg for a sharp single, the fielder hits the stumps direct at the batsman's end  but Taylor was safe
flighted delivery on middle stump, Taylor gets down on one knee and sweeps powerfully to the square leg boundary
full ball on off stump, driven powerfully off the front foot towards mid-off where Mubarak dives to his right and fields
full toss pulled to wide long-on for a single
pushed into the covers for a single
full ball on middle stump, the batsman moves across his stumps and chips the ball over short fine leg's head
full and wide outside off stump
low full toss, right in the slot, swung over midwicket
yorker length, on the off and middle, squeezed out to backward point
floated outside off, shuffled right across and fetches it from outside off and swings to long-on
slower through the air, lovely  change of pace, on the off stump, the batsman was made to wait an eternity, no pace to work with and he ended up chopping it to the backward point
steps down the track and hits it to left of midwicket
fullish, just outside leg stump, the yorker length beats the intended swing to the leg side and the ball runs off the pad to the off side
on the leg and middle again, turned past square leg
on the middle and off, mistimes a drive to right of midwicket
slips down the leg side, he doesn't connect with the intended flick shot, the bat touches the ground and Sangakkara can't gather
on the middle and leg, hit past midwicket
low full-toss, on the middle stump line, whacked over deep midwicket.
dipping low full toss, on the middle, played to the on side
full and outside off stump, sliced straight to sweeper cover.
slower one, outside off stump, tries to late cut it and is beaten
spins past Styris who fails to connect with his cut shot
this time connects and cuts to left of deep point
trapped in front. Full and on the middle and off stump, Styris shapes to play a reverse sweep, misses and that proves fatal. Hawk eye suggests it would have missed the off stump.
floated on the middle, driven to cover

McMillan moves outside leg-side, Jayasuriya fires it in between the leg stump and McMillan who can't connect with his drive and Sangakkara quickly whips the bails off. Smart work but McMillan had just dragged his back foot in.
very full and outside the off, Malinga searching for the yorker, dug out to the off side for a single that brings up the hundred
another yorker, once again there's little the batsman can do but dig the ball out for a single towards point
overpitched and outside the off, driven inside-out and through cover but there's a fielder on the ropes
quick ball just short of a driving length, swing and a miss with no footwork and the ball just misses the stumps. Good ball that

fuller and on the stumps, the ball is punched to cover, the batsman head off for a single, McMillan isn't too quick, the throw comes to the bowler, Malinga catches the ball and breaks the stumps. The decision is referred to the third umpire ... and gone!
very full and on the off, tailing inswing here, clipped away to the leg side
fullish and outside the off, swung away to the leg side, one bounce to Jehan Mubarak on the ropes
low full-toss outside the off stump, driven down to long-off
again flat, full and straight, driven down to long-on for a single
another no-risk shot. a full-toss is clipped away to the on side
slightly slower, little shorter and a bit of width, cut but there's cover on the fence
Brilliant shot! Oram reverse sweeps very fine, taking the ball on the full and just deflecting it between the keeper and short third-man
full and outside the off, driven well through cover, but once again just the single
very full and on the off stump, good yorker, all Oram can do is dab the ball to off and pick up a single
down the leg side and very full, flick played and missed, a bit of a sound, that may have hit pad, but the umpire gives it wide
short of a good length and on the stumps, slower ball, defended to the on side for a single
very very full and outside the off, steered through cover for a single
another yorker, Malinga has an endless supply of these, excellent bowling, dug out to the off side
slower ball, excellent deception, swing and a miss, the ball just misses the stumps. After all those searing yorkers the slower ball, clever bowling
Smack! Ross Taylor gets down on one knee, picks the line of the ball and crashes it over midwicket. That's a strong hit
fuller this time and slanted away from the bat from over the stumps, played at and missed, Sangakkara collects standing up
slower ball, slipping down leg, swung away but it's fielded well on the ropes
full-toss outside the off stump, driven powerfully down to long-off but attacking fielding keeps the batsmen down to one run
back of a length and outside the off, Taylor heaves to the leg side and misses
this time there's a second as the ball is helped along to the leg side
fullish and outside the off stump, played at and missed, through to the keeper
slower ball, very full, drifting onto the pads, swing and a miss, rapped on the pad
Oram does his thing! Malinga striving for the yorker. Oram gives himself some room and clatters the ball back down the ground, over Malinga's head for maximum
short of a length and outside the off, steered down towards third-man for a single
fullish and outside the off stump, clattered over the infield and that will run away to the fence

fullish and on the off, Oram tees off. He gets a bit too much under that one and hits it very very very high but not too far. Jayasuriya gets under the ball but misjudges the tough catch and floors it
whacked over the infield, didn't quite get hold of that, safe enough
full and on the stump, good yorker swinging in, dug out and there's enough on the ball for the batsmen to come back for a second
short of a length and outside the off, ugly swipe across the line, through to the keeper
another one outside the off, another swing and completely missed. That was the slower ball and the batsman didn't pick it at all
full and on the stumps, dug out to the off side
very fast, inswinging, well-directed yorker. There's not much any batsman can do with that but dig it out. Superb death bowling
slightly short this time and outside the off, Oram doesn't get to the pitch of this slower ball but swats it over the infield one-handed and the ball just trickles away
fullish and outside the off, huge pull played, miss, through to the keeper
very full and outside the off, hit inside out to the man on the ropes at cover

very full, very straight, Taylor opens the face of the bat and tries to run the ball down to third-man. All he manages is a simple catch straight into Sangakkara's hands. End of a cracking innings from Taylor
fullish and on the stumps, played to the off side for a single
full and outside the off, driven back past the bowler to mid-off
full and on the stumps, a hint of swing, driven hard but straight back to the bowler
fullish, outside the off, a bit of room from the batsman backing away to leg and that is clouted over point
hit over the off side for another run. attempted big shot but doesn't quite connect
very full, straight, driven hard down to long-on, the batsmen run hard, coming back for the second but the throw is good and an easy run out ends the innings
